entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023
